name: Trickstar Festival
effectText: Special Summon 2 "Trickstar Tokens" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). If a "Trickstar" monster(s) you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Trickstar" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Trickstar Festival" per turn.
